DOC.brief_summary: To investigate a potential pharmacokinetic interaction between SKI-606 and ketoconazole when co-administered.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Drug Interaction Between Multiple Doses of Ketoconazole and a Single Dose of SKI-606
DOC.criteria: Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12lead ECG.
